modName: FNIS - convert Player Idle spell to power
summary: A simple mod that converts the FNIS Spells Player Idle spell into a power activated with the "Shout" button.
descriptionHtml:
Converts the FNIS Spells "Player Idle" spell into a power activated with the "Shout" button.

[u]Pros:[/u]
- Can use Player Idle animation with sheathed weapons, so rotating the camera will not change the direction your character is facing. No more need to switch into free-floating camera mode to get a good look at the animation!
- Can equip Idle Selection, NPC Idle and Player Idle spells all at once.

[u]Installation:[/u]
Simply place it anywhere after [b]FNISspells.esp[/b].
